description:
INSTANTLY UNLOCK AND PLAY AS SPIDER-MAN WITH $5 OF Gs AND A BONUS COSTUME AT A STEEP DISCOUNT FOR A LIMITED TIME!

Pack Includes:

- Instant Closed Beta Access

- Playable Spider-Man: Immediately unlock the wallcrawler himself. Everyone’s favorite neighborhood Spider-Man, one of the most famous heroes of all-time.

- Bonus Costume: Inspired by Marvel’s Captain America: Civil War.

- XP Boost: Level up faster with a healthy dose of pure XP Boost.

- 500 Gs: Universally accepted virtual in-game currency for additional heroes, costumes, boosts, and more!

Committed, hardcore players who purchase all five of the Marvel Heroes Omega Founder’s Packs will receive a tremendous dedicated fan bonus that includes:

- Timed Exclusive Symbiote Spider-Man Costume

- Timed Exclusive Hero Iron Fist
